discussion_comments.comment_body:
```suggestion
    right: 10px; /* Allows clicking on the scrollbar */
```

```suggestion
  user-select: none;
```
Will this suffice, assuming that postcss autoprefixer works properly? If not, feel free to ignore this.
Last time I checked it seems postcss did not transform them. I will do a double check.
The `autoprefixer` is not being configured at the root level. I will add that in another PR. See https://github.com/logseq/logseq/pull/7314
